name: Armoured Jacket
description: Appears as a normal three-quarters length jacket. Close examination may reveal its true nature (Very Difficult 12+ check).

name: Protective Vest
description: Standard bullet-proof vest. Easily concealed under normal clothing (Very Difficult 12+ check to spot).

name: Fluidic G-Suit
description: Fills pilot's lungs with oxygenated fluorocarbons to compensate for G stresses. Adds DM+2 to all END checks for high-G manoeuvres.

name: Full-Body Inertial Armour
description: Thick, flexible armour with multiple layers for thermal and impact protection. Protects equally against kinetic and energy weapons.

name: Full-Body Rigid Armour
description: Also known as 'clamshell' armour. Heavy and fatiguing but provides excellent protection.

name: Inertial Armour Vest
description: Long vest with additional padding and thicker armour. Cannot be worn over any other armour.

name: Rigid Breastplate
description: Heavy front-and-back armour. Often combined with inertial for maximum protection. Heavy and awkward.

name: Vedette Half Armour
description: Rigid ceramic/alloy plate protecting chest and shoulders. Can be combined with inertial armour.

name: Helmet
description: Standard issue moulded composite helmet. Comes with 10km tactical radio. Can add full-face visor or gas mask.

name: High Threat Combat Helmet
description: Best protection available for the skull. Equipped with 10km radio, tactical camera, HUD with low-light imaging, and anti-dazzle coating.

name: Drachentruppen Battlesuit
description: Combination of full-body rigid armour, breastplate, high-threat combat helmet, armoured boots, and undergarment with cooling and joint protection. Full life support for 6 hours. Not powered but heavy. Combat effective for only a few hours.

name: Guderian K-19B Combat Vacuum Suit
description: Developed for boarding actions and vacuum combat. Rigid torso with flexible limbs. Self-sealing system handles small breaches. 20km radio, anti-dazzle visor, armoured backpack with personal life support.

name: Khatar Hostile Environment Suit
description: Advanced hardsuit for extreme environmental conditions. Provides comprehensive protection against hazardous atmospheres and radiation.

name: Ruffin Orbital Science Raffik P-Suit
description: Close-fitting softsuit with bubble helmet. Battery-powered life support with 4-hour duration from internal bottle. 5km radio and beacon. Can be extended with additional bottles.

name: Personal Life Support System (PLSS-C)
description: Extends pressure suit capabilities. Good for 12 hours of use, extendable to 24 hours with additional bottled oxygen (up to four 3-hour bottles).

name: Additional Oxygen Tank (3-hour bottle)
description: Extra oxygen bottle for life support systems. Adds 3 hours of life support duration.

name: Full-Face Visor
description: Transparent diamondoid faceplate hardened to stop bullets and shrapnel. Auto-darkening feature. Restricts field of view (DM-1 to visual Recon/Investigate).

name: HUD System
description: Heads-Up Display puts data and images in reticule. Works with electronic sights for DM+1 to attack rolls. Can link to body comps and sensor systems.

name: Low-Light Imaging
description: Allows negation of penalties for poor lighting as long as weak light source exists (like starlight).

name: Tactical Camera
description: Records internally and narrowcasts to command centre (500m range). Stores 6 hours of high-res video/audio.

name: Thermal Imaging
description: See heat sources colour-coded from blue (cold) to white (hot). Negates cover penalties for spotting (up to 30cm thick).

name: Laser Sight
description: Small laser for rapid target acquisition. DM+1 at short range, at all ranges if with telescopic sight. DM+1 to Recon to spot shooter.

name: Red Dot Sight
description: Non-magnifying scope with red dot. DM+1 to attack rolls at less than long range.

name: Telescopic Sight
description: Available in various ranges matched to weapon. Gives weapon the Scope trait. Cost equals weapon range in Lv.

name: Smart Grenade Sight
description: Reads exact distance and feeds to programmable grenades. DM+2 to attack rolls with compatible grenades.

name: SCEMS Overlay
description: Places SCEMS sensor on scope overlaying radio-frequency activity. See electrical devices through cover.

name: Bipod
description: Deployed under rifle for stability. Grants DM+1 to attack rolls when aiming.

name: Suppressor
description: Reduces noise (DM-1 to Recon checks to locate shooter). Does not eliminate sound. Cannot be used on gauss weapons.
